name: Federico Yankelevich
description: Dreamer about the future and Developer Advocate. Working to improve developers life. Co-Founder of ated4kids.ch, a non-profit group organizing Devoxx4Kids events in Ticino.

name: Celestino Bellone
description: Passionate software developer, open source advocate. He usually feels frustrated when put in front of frames or bitten fruits. Use penguins to calm him down

name: Mario Fusco
description: Mario is a senior software engineer at Red Hat working at the development of the core of Drools. He's author of the lambdaj library and co-author of Java 8 in Action.

name: Cristina Giotto
description: Attiva da tempo nel settore informatico in ated – ICT Ticino e co-fondatrice di ated4kids. Aperta e entusiasta, pronta a sostenere tutte le iniziative che posso dare al Ticino tecnologico una marcia in più!

name: Aldo Pizzagalli
description: User Experience Designer & FrontEnd Developer. Co-Founder of @FrontEndersTI.

name: Daniele Madama
description: CTO at Etalia SA, I love to spent my freetime riding my motorbike, playing with LEGO Technic and RC models

name: Elia Contini
description: Lead User Experience Designer, FrontEnd Engineer @Trendrating, but opinions are all mine. Founder of @FrontEndersTI, open and free (as in freedom) software fan.
